Name: Sins From Magdala
About the game: A setting from the 1st century A.D. is the cover letter of Sins From Magdala , in true escape room style , we are going to have to solve 7 enigmas hidden in each corner of its rooms, each one related to a different deadly sin. Using as a basis the biblical verses in which it refers to the 7 demons that Jesus expelled from Mary Magdalene : To solve them we must analyze each of the 7 sins and make use of our virtues as human beings to correct what is wrong with us and know how to dominate the 7 demons that govern us, through different types of puzzles: visual, logical and of skill . If you are a fan of puzzle games, come and live this adventure from a recondite place in the city of Magdala.
